name: SpaceShot (itch)
description:
The Game is a tribute to the old classic Moorhuhn game. In SpaceShot you have to shoot on planets in order to destroy the universe. The reason why you want to destroy it is up to you.

Controls

You just need the mouse to play the game.

Left Mouse ButtonShootRight Mouse ButtonRecharge Ammo Credits Game created byKevin Nohr-HipelGame Assets byUnity Assets Store (Free Assets)Music bySoundimage.org Why did I create this Game?

SpaceShot was made in a purpose of the Ludum Dare 43. Sadly I could not participate in the Game Jam. But, I decided to take the topic and create a game for myself. 

This is an early version of the game. So, if you like the game or if you have feedback on what I can improve, write it in the comment section.
